title: Provided further that, for buildings like cinema theatres, multiplex, assembly buildings, shopping malls etc
clause_text: Provided further that, for buildings like cinema theatres, multiplex, assembly buildings, shopping malls etc., regulations for outside congested area, except FSI, shall apply.
section: Other buildings like Public / Semi-Public, Educational, Medical, Institutional, Commercial, Mercantile, etc.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided further that, for buildings like cinema theatres, multiplex, assembly buildings, shopping malls etc., regulations for outside congested area, except FSI, shall apply.
